entry.title: Powershell
entry.summary: PowerShell/CMD Commands PowerShell/CMD commands for general Windows tasks. Computer Configuration Rename PC Rename-Computer -NewName "NewName" -DomainCredential fcpediatrics\User Change PC Description $value = @{Description = 'E-0000'} Set-CimInstance -Query 'Select * From Win32_OperatingSystem' -Property $value Change DNS netsh interface ipv4 show config netsh interface ipv4 set dn...
